Articles.Content:
I'm trying to find a real solar system mod (hopefully a small, fun sized one)  that is compatible with KSP 1.7.   I tried installing several versions but couldn't get the right files in place and was advised to use CKAN.  Now with CKAN installed I can't find any compatible solar system mods for 1.7.  (I set my CKAN to 1.7 and the only related mods are the three 'textures'.   

Any advice on this issue?  Thanks.
1.7 just came out, it may take a while for modders to come out with updated versions

52 minutes ago, Isidro22 said:

1.7 just came out, it may take a while for modders to come out with updated versions

Ah thanks.  I'm doing the right thing though by letting CKAN protect me from possibly outdated mods eh?

@GungaDin, you have 2 potential options.

1. Use a version of KSP compatible with the mod (KSP 1.6.1). 

2. Use the mod in 1.7.0 and ignore the warning message. It’s like driving a car where the CHECK ENGINE light won’t turn off. It’s probably still working ok, but it’s on you if something breaks.
